page.title: 16Adult Education 2
page.content: There are classes to help parents understand what we children are doing with computers, and there are several Computer Groups where people with computers exchange ideas (and probably copy programs!) There are several courses concerned with women - Women's Rights, for example. There is a lot of concern that womwn are treated unfairly by men, and they do not have the same opportunities. People who have retired have special classes provided for them, and lots of older people now "go to school" Other opportunities include: Photography, Fishing, Playing the Guitar,Local and Family History (See above), First Aid........
